name: The Nine (itch)
description:
This is the first game that I am releasing to be played by subscribers on my channel. Please note, this is in no way supposed to be a finished production (there isn't even a pause menu ;) ). I am profiting in no way aside from a donation or two. 

I hope you enjoy. My commitment to anyone who chooses to follow along with my game making journey is that the next one I release will be far better then this. Thank you for taking the time to read this!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC965YNMZYvhErNB72AlKYRg
